relevant_findings.general: Pleasant elderly man mildly tachypneic with pursed lip breathing
relevant_findings.HEENT: Sclera with mild icterus, conjunctiva pink, MMM with palatal jaundice
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Lungs with diminished breath sounds bilaterally, few rales at R base, no wheezing
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Heart sounds distant, no murmurs appreciated
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, distended, tender RUQ and epigastrium, no rigidity or guarding, +bowel sounds
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm, no edema, palpable distal pulses
relevant_findings.neurological: Alert, awake and answering appropriately, moving all extremities
